snippet: The Obama administration last month unveiled new rules requiring insurance plans at some religious institutions to provide free contraception to their employees.
abstract: The Obama administration last month unveiled new rules requiring insurance plans at some religious institutions to provide free contraception to their employees.
lead_paragraph: 10:48 p.m. | Updated The full report of this article is available here.

headline.main: White House May Look to Compromise on Contraception Decision
